title: 百合姫 Wildrose 1
description: Volume 1 contains:• Suki Tokidoki Kiss by Miyashita Kitsune• Ichiban Sukina Hito by Tokitsukaze Otoha• Arcadia ~Flowers of Paradise~ by Mizuno Touko• Girls' Union by Morishima Akiko• From Your L-I-P-S by Jounouchi Nene• Hao! by Chi-Ran• The Greenhouse Witch by Mikuni Hajime• Sweet Little Devil by Nanzaki Iku• Blue by Hayase Hashibaand a collection of Yuri Hime Art.
author: 一迅社
